question:
A friend has offered you some work in his company. You are currently employed and not able to start for three months.
Write a reply to your friend. In your letter:
give details of what you know about his company
explain your current situation
give your answer to the offer and explain why
text: Hope you are doing well. I am writing you this letter regarding the job of senior consultant in your company where you referred me. First of all thanks a lot , I got selected for the position but,unfortunately I cannot join before three month .

I know ABC consultancy services is well-known company for its software solutions. Having multiple opportunities for each domain eg. java developer , consultant and quality analyst. moreover having vacancies for human resources as well.

I would like to tell you that, I put my resignation in the system even it got approved as well by supervisor, but as per the company ,policy I have to serve 3 month's notice period which is non-buyable.

I am providing you with  a confirmation to join the firm, after serving the notice period as the position offered to me is my dream job where I explore more in my career. And you will get your referral award as well when I join. Please discuss this with your supervisor and let me know the further update.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase unfortunately. Consider adding a comma.
The singular noun month follows a number other than one. Consider changing the noun to the plural form.
The noun phrase well-known company seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
It seems that conjunction use may be incorrect here.
The noun phrase supervisor seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
The noun phrase policy seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
